class.name: RDShaderSPIRV
class.brief_description: SPIR-V intermediate representation as part of a [RDShaderFile] (used by [RenderingDevice]).
class.description: [RDShaderSPIRV] represents a [RDShaderFile]'s [url=https://www.khronos.org/spir/]SPIR-V[/url] code for various shader stages, as well as possible compilation error messages. SPIR-V is a low-level intermediate shader representation. This intermediate representation is not used directly by GPUs for rendering, but it can be compiled into binary shaders that GPUs can understand. Unlike compiled shaders, SPIR-V is portable across GPU models and driver versions. This object is used by [RenderingDevice].

method.name: get_stage_bytecode
method.description: Equivalent to getting one of [member bytecode_compute], [member bytecode_fragment], [member bytecode_tesselation_control], [member bytecode_tesselation_evaluation], [member bytecode_vertex].

method.name: get_stage_compile_error
method.description: Returns the compilation error message for the given shader [param stage]. Equivalent to getting one of [member compile_error_compute], [member compile_error_fragment], [member compile_error_tesselation_control], [member compile_error_tesselation_evaluation], [member compile_error_vertex].

method.name: set_stage_bytecode
method.description: Sets the SPIR-V [param bytecode] for the given shader [param stage]. Equivalent to setting one of [member bytecode_compute], [member bytecode_fragment], [member bytecode_tesselation_control], [member bytecode_tesselation_evaluation], [member bytecode_vertex].

method.name: set_stage_compile_error
method.description: Sets the compilation error message for the given shader [param stage] to [param compile_error]. Equivalent to setting one of [member compile_error_compute], [member compile_error_fragment], [member compile_error_tesselation_control], [member compile_error_tesselation_evaluation], [member compile_error_vertex].
